values:
If you be my star
I'll be your sky
you can hide underneath me and come out at night
when I turn jet black and you show off your light
I live to let you shine
I live to let you shine

But you can skyrocket away from me
and never come back if you find another galaxy
far from here with more room to fly
just leave me your stardust to remember you by

if you be my boat
I'll be your sea
a depth of pure blue just to probe curiosity
ebbing and flowing and pushed by a breeze
I live to make you free
I live to make you free

but you can set sail to the west if you want to
and past the horizon till I can't even see you
far from here where the beaches are wide
just leave me your wake to remember you by

if you be my star
I'll be your sky
you can hide underneath me and come out at night
when I turn jet black and you show off your light
I live to let you shine
I live to let you shine

but you can skyrocket away from me
and never come back if you find another galaxy
far from here with more room to fly
just leave me your stardust to remember you by
stardust to remember you by

okay. this has been the best 5 minutes of the year up to date. I got early acceptance to waterloo, fuck yeah! I emailed les savy fav, and syd emailed me back THE NEXT DAY. (today.) Dear Savvy Men, I'm sure this isn't the first time you've heard this. But. I think it would be unacceptable for me to be a passive bystander in this situation, and not tell you to please tour North America. (Sooner then later.) It would be pretty fun. Toronto, Canada in specific would be..pretty snazzy. For the both of us! I already planned it all out. You know; You could see the CN Tower. And.. Since I'm 17, you could make it an all ages show. Or 17+. (That's really selfish. Stick with all ages.) Just because we're young and don't find pleasure in drinking, (or we're just not allowed) doesn't mean we won't be a crazy good audience, yeah! I can not listen to your delicious singing voices or vocals and blur up your painfully accurate guitar riffs in my ears without alcohol yeah! This is getting long. Okay. The thesis of this email is that I want to see you. LIVE. sincerely; donna martey. (made in canada.) And then.. He said.. donna, i would love to play in canada.. i love canada. I live in Vancouver and loved it. i love hockey and any country that loves hockey is a place i want to play. but, we need a new record. soon soon Oh man oh man! Oh man!!! <3 (oh man!)

I used to know this girl
Who gave her love away
To every guy she met
And with all the games they played
She never seemed to cry
She never got upset
And one by one they came
And one by one they left
I thought that I could fix her
If she would let me in
But all of my advances
Were shut down in the end
When days turned into months
I begged her to explain
And this is what she sang

It's not like I'm a slut
Or that I really like to fuck
I just want every boy I see
To walk away with part of me
Until there's nothing left to hold
Until there's nothing left to hate
I appreciate your help
But even you can't save me from myself

I used to know this boy
Who took notes in a book
But he ripped out all the pages
Before I got a look
At all the words he scribbled
At all the lines he filled
But the ink stains on his fingers
Told me he was skilled
At capturing a feeling
That most of us just miss
The simple pain of living
With goodbyes on our lips
I found one of the pages
Crumpled by her bed
And this is how it read

It's not like I am weak
Or that I don't know how to leave
It's just that every time you cheat
You bring me closer to defeat

Until there's nothing left to love
Until there's nothing left to say
I know that you need help
But even I can't save you from yourself

Yesterday I tried being into nail polish.
I can never put it on without getting it the cuticle parts.
Whenever I see nail polish on other people, it's like, woah.
So I figured that they probably paint all sloppy and just use nail polish remover to take it off the skin parts.
I was wrong.

I couldn't get it off my skin, it was everywhere, it was late at night. The smell of the polish remover was making me nauseous, so I went to bed.

I woke up in the morning and my nails looked the same.
Their was no time to even try to take it off.
Their is hardly ever anytime pee.

I hid my hands all day.
The Futureheads are beautiful and lovely.
